description.value:
This snare is often used to mark intruders for later tracking or identification. When you create this snare, you must decide whether to make it a dye or a scent marker. Either type of marking grants a +2 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Track] the creature for up to 24 hours or until the dye or scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). A creature that enters a square of the snare must attempt a @Check[reflex|showDC:all|dc:17] save.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The snare marks the creature.

Critical Failure The snare marks the creature, and the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] until the end of its next turn.
